name: HoneywellAirTouch
0:
”Alexa, turn on the air purifier”
”Alexa, turn off the air purifier”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to voice control your Honeywell Air Purifier. After connecting Alexa to your Honeywell Air Purifier follow these simple steps:
1. Download the "Honeywell Air Touch" app from Apple App store or Google Play Store then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account).
2. Configure the Honeywell Air Purifier with "Honeywell Air Touch" app.
3. Enable "Honeywell Air Touch" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my Honeywell Air Purifier. Wait for Echo to say "Search complete".
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your Honeywell Air Purifier like mentioned below:
Alexa, turn on the air purifier.
Alexa, turn off the air purifier.
Alexa, increase the fan speed.
Alexa, decrease the fan speed.
Alexa, enable child lock.
Alexa, enable auto mode.
Alexa, enable sleep mode.
